title: WELCOME
body: Hello and welcome to the team, an agent will be in touch soon

title: Missed Lessons
body: You missed your russian lessons this week, be a shame if something happened

title: Hey Boss
body: I got the database set up for you, if need anything i will help. Dont worry i wont pry ;).

title: Regarding passing of Baughman
body: It's unfortunate to see an agent pass away, but at least it was of old age... He was a good man indeed and the last thing we need is his name tarnished. Please send in cleanup ASAP.
